metadata.name: Night Creatures
metadata.description: Enter a world steeped in the old-school horror comics of yesteryear with a modern twist; enter the world of Night Creatures. Collected here for the first time. All three issues of spine-tingling terror, written and rendered in full colour CGI glory. Watch what happens when two legendary monsters collide. See the power of love gone sour bring a plush figure to life. Witness mystery and murder mix in the museum’s shadowy hallways. Or try exploring all three terrifying tomes...if you dare!
